quantr 0.1.3
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Stock valuation using discounted cash flow (DCF)

    quantr

    R package for fetching financials and stock market data.

    Installation

    devtools::install_github("pieterprovoost/quantr")

    Usage

    See full documentation at https://pieterprovoost.github.io/quantr/.

    Euronext tickers

    euronext_tickers("XBRU")

# A tibble: 144 x 12

    Yahoo Finance financials (income statement, balance sheet, cash flow)

    yahoo_financials(c("AAPL", "MSFT"))

    Plot key financials

    yahoo_financials(c("TSLA", "NIO")) %>%
   plot_yahoo_financials()
